#summary Related Work

WARNING: Tips / links / claims found on this page haven't necessarily been tested by anyone affiliated with Google or the GoogleCL project. If you have a problem using one of these expansions, your best bet is to find and contact the original author.

 * GoogleCL on the [http://groups.google.com/group/googlecl-discuss/browse_thread/thread/5a983dcc0df4f9b4 Nokia 810 Internet Tablet]

 * Android can run googlecl with a little work: [http://publicint.blogspot.com/2010/06/build-talking-calendar-with-googlecl.html]

 * [http://code.google.com/p/googlecl/issues/detail?id=73#c1 This] comment contains a bash completion script, and so does [http://github.com/bobthecow/googlecl-completion this] github repo. To install one, copy it to /etc/bash_completion.d

 * Julien Danjou created a [http://julien.danjou.info/blog/2010.html#M%2Dx%20google%2Dmaps google-maps] command for emacs

 * [http://code.google.com/p/gcalcli/ gcalcli] is a neat python command line tool for using google calendar

 * A [https://code.google.com/p/google-apps-groups-management-tools/ Google Groups management tool] has been put together by Kurt (as descrbed in [http://groups.google.com/group/googlecl-discuss/browse_thread/thread/2a956f15767d7fbd this post]).
